faq.title: अक्सर पूछे जाने वाले प्रश्न
faq.q1: क्या YouTube थंबनेल डाउनलोड करना कानूनी है?
faq.a1: हाँ, व्यक्तिगत उपयोग, प्रेरणा या शैक्षिक उद्देश्यों के लिए YouTube थंबनेल डाउनलोड करना आम तौर पर उचित उपयोग के तहत कानूनी माना जाता है।
faq.q2: क्या मैं YouTube Shorts से थंबनेल डाउनलोड कर सकता हूँ?
faq.a2: बिल्कुल! हमारा टूल YouTube Shorts, नियमित वीडियो, लाइव स्ट्रीम और असूचीबद्ध वीडियो का पूरी तरह से समर्थन करता है।
faq.q3: 4K थंबनेल विकल्प कभी-कभी उपलब्ध क्यों नहीं होता है?
faq.a3: सभी YouTube वीडियो में 4K रिज़ॉल्यूशन थंबनेल नहीं होते हैं। अधिकतम रिज़ॉल्यूशन मूल वीडियो गुणवत्ता पर निर्भर करता है।
faq.q4: क्या यह iPhone और Android पर काम करता है?
faq.a4: हाँ! हमारा टूल iPhone, iPad, Android फोन, Mac और Windows PC सहित सभी उपकरणों पर पूरी तरह से काम करता है।
faq.q5: क्या यह टूल पूरी तरह से मुफ्त है?
faq.a5: हाँ, हमारा YouTube थंबनेल डाउनलोडर बिना किसी छिपी लागत और बिना किसी डाउनलोड सीमा के 100% मुफ्त है।
faq.q6: सबसे अच्छा YouTube थंबनेल आकार क्या है?
faq.a6: अनुशंसित आकार 16:9 पहलू अनुपात और 2MB फ़ाइल आकार के तहत 1280 × 720 पिक्सेल है।
faq.q7: मैं YouTube वीडियो का URL कैसे प्राप्त करूँ?
faq.a7: अपने ब्राउज़र के एड्रेस बार से URL कॉपी करें या वीडियो के नीचे शेयर बटन पर क्लिक करें।
faq.q8: क्या मैं Vimeo थंबनेल भी डाउनलोड कर सकता हूँ?
faq.a8: हाँ! हमारा टूल YouTube और Vimeo दोनों वीडियो प्लेटफ़ॉर्म का समर्थन करता है।
faq.q9: क्या आप मेरे डाउनलोड या URL संग्रहीत करते हैं?
faq.a9: नहीं, हम अपने सर्वर पर कोई थंबनेल, URL या व्यक्तिगत डेटा संग्रहीत नहीं करते हैं।
faq.q10: स्क्रीनशॉट के बजाय इसका उपयोग क्यों करें?
faq.a10: हमारा टूल संपीड़ित स्क्रीनशॉट के विपरीत, अक्सर 4K रिज़ॉल्यूशन में उच्चतम गुणवत्ता वाली मूल छवियां प्रदान करता है।

guide.title: YouTube थंबनेल के लिए अंतिम गाइड
guide.p1: YouTube थंबनेल आपकी वीडियो सामग्री का दृश्य प्रवेश द्वार हैं। शोध से पता चलता है कि कस्टम थंबनेल क्लिक-थ्रू दरों को 154% तक बढ़ा सकते हैं।
guide.p2: हमारा टूल सामग्री निर्माताओं और विपणक को विश्लेषण और प्रेरणा के लिए उच्च गुणवत्ता वाले वीडियो थंबनेल तक पहुंचने में मदद करता है।
guide.p3: एक्सट्रैक्टर मानक वीडियो, शॉर्ट्स और लाइव स्ट्रीम सहित सभी प्रमुख वीडियो प्रारूपों का समर्थन करता है।
guide.p4: अन्य टूल के विपरीत, हमारा डाउनलोडर पूरी तरह से आपके ब्राउज़र में काम करता है जिसमें किसी सॉफ़्टवेयर इंस्टॉलेशन की आवश्यकता नहीं होती है।

hero.title: About YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
hero.description: The <strong1>fastest and most reliable free tool</strong1> to download YouTube video thumbnails in 4K, Full HD, and SD quality. Trusted by content creators, marketers, and millions of users worldwide.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: <strong1>YouTube Thumbnail Downloader</strong1> was born out of a simple need: content creators and marketers needed a fast, reliable, and free way to download high-quality YouTube thumbnails without complicated software or registration requirements.
story.p2: As digital content continues to grow exponentially, thumbnails have become crucial for video success. They're the first thing viewers see, and a compelling thumbnail can dramatically increase click-through rates. Our <strong1>YouTube thumbnail grabber</strong1> makes it easy to:

list.l1: Study successful thumbnail designs for inspiration
list.l2: Archive your own video thumbnails for portfolio purposes
list.l3: Analyze competitor strategies in your niche
list.l4: Create reaction content or video essays (with proper attribution)
list.l5: Save thumbnails for offline reference and research

story.p3: Today, our <strong1>free YouTube thumbnail downloader</strong1> serves over half a million users every month, processing millions of thumbnail downloads while maintaining lightning-fast speeds and 100% uptime.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: Welcome to YouTube Thumbnail Downloader ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our <strong1>free YouTube thumbnail downloader</strong1> service.
intro.p2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.p1: We prioritize user privacy and collect minimal data necessary to provide our service.
collection.p2: We <strong1>DO NOT</strong1> require registration, account creation, or personal information (such as name, email address, or phone number) to use our YouTube thumbnail downloader tool.
collection.p3: Like most websites, we may automatically collect certain information when you visit our site, including:

list.l4: Time and date of your visit
list.l5: Pages visited and time spent on those pages

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
cookies.p2: We use Google Analytics to understand how our website is being used in order to improve the user experience. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect information such as how often users visit this site, what pages they visit when they do so, and what other sites they used prior to coming to this site.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.p1: We use the collected information for various purposes:

list.l1: To provide and maintain our Service
list.l2: To monitor the usage of our Service
list.l3: To detect, prevent and address technical issues
list.l4: To improve our website and user experience

security.title: Data Security
security.content: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

ads.title: Advertising
ads.content: We may use third-party Service Providers to show advertisements to you to help support and maintain our Service. These third parties may use cookies or similar technologies to gather information about your activities on this and other websites to provide you with advertising based upon your browsing activities and interests.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13.

metadata.title: Terms of Service - YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
metadata.description: Read our terms of service to understand the rules and guidelines for using YouTube Thumbnail Downloader. Learn about acceptable use, intellectual property, and user responsibilities.
metadata.ogTitle: Terms of Service - YouTube Thumbnail Downloader
metadata.ogDescription: Terms and conditions for using our free YouTube thumbnail download tool.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.p1: Welcome to YouTube Thumbnail Downloader. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website and the <strong1>free YouTube thumbnail downloader</strong1> service (collectively, the "Service").
agreement.p2: By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.

use.title: Use of Service
use.p1: Our service allows you to download thumbnails from YouTube videos. You agree to use the Service only for purposes that are permitted by these Terms and any applicable law, regulation, or generally accepted practices or guidelines in the relevant jurisdictions.

list.l1: Use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
list.l2: Attempt to disrupt or overload our servers or networks.
list.l3: Use any automated means (bots, scrapers, etc.) to access the Service without our permission.
list.l4: Download thumbnails that you do not have the right to use.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.p1: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of YouTube Thumbnail Downloader and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.
ip.p2: The thumbnails you download are the intellectual property of their respective owners (the YouTube video creators). We do not claim ownership of any thumbnails downloaded through our Service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.
